start_faery_cutscene: ^Oh dear! Oh no! I can't believe this is happening...
^Everyone's forgotten all about music! And they don't even know they forgot!
^Is that Melody? Yes. At least I've come to the right place.
^Only she can help the village remember! Help us, Melody. You're our only hope...

b: ^Good, you found it! Give this big lumber pile a whack.
^Please do something about this unsightly lump of lumber!
^Oh, as ready as I'll ever be! What's first?
^We found this big pile of firewood in the living room.
^But it's all stuck together. Can you chop it into smaller pieces?
^Thanks, Melody! You can just use the scythe.
^Aww, Father let you use the scythe?
^Are you doing chores today? I'm not!
^This looks pretty weird for a "pile of lumber." And why does it have a keyhole?
^I'm the Spirit of Music. Whatever you do, don't hurt that piano!
^The Spirit of Music, huh? But this is just a bunch of kindling.
^It most certainly is not. It's a piano. And by the looks of it, a lovely one.
^If it's that important to you, I won't hurt this...piano.
^Really? You won't? Hooray! Maybe you can help me save the other instruments?
^The horrible Ear Worm has erased everyone's memory of music! The other instruments are in grave peril.
^What can I do to help? I have no special skills...
^Actually, you happen to be a brilliant composer! You've just forgotten... like everyone else.
^Yes! But in order to remember, you have to help me collect all the instruments, learn about them, and assemble them into an orchestra. Then you'll be able to hear your beautiful song!
^Great! Hooray! The lid of the piano is closed and locked right now. I was going to open it up, but I dropped the key in your wheat field.
^Okay. But...I haven't used the scythe before.
^It's easy, as long as you're safe. Just click the area that you'd like to scythe.
^One last thing: there was a book about pianos around here somewhere. Have you seen it?

c-0: ^Good! You can find it in your Inventory and read it, to jog your memory on pianos!
c-1: ^It should be around here on the floor. Please find it and read it, to jog your memory on pianos!

b: ^You did it! You got the key! I knew you could do it!
^Let me just try this key in the lock... Done!
^Play "Ode to Joy!" You'll see the notes on the screen. That's your dad's favorite tune. He'll hear it and remember what music is!
^I... I remember that sound! That was Ode to Joy!
^Yes! And this is a piano, not firewood.
^I can't believe I forgot! I must have been out of my mind. Hooray!
^We sure did. Nice work, Melody. But there's still a lot of work left to do! Will you finish finding the rest of the musical instruments and saving them?
^What is this big wooden thing in my house?

pianoquest_scythe: ^I finally get to use the scythe! Father never let me because it's sharp.
^I had better see if I can use it on that pile of kindling in the house.
